title: Prostration (Sujood) is on 7 bones - Assim al hakeem
transcript: so in order to do sued you will find that I'll take my glasses now I can't see you but alhamdulillah you can see why do you take your glasses off share because it will hinder putting the sued spots properly on what do you mean by sujood frustration as a prophet said Alison I was ordered to prostrate on seven limbs he said the face and he pointed to his nose meaning the forehead and the nose these are related this is one organ the hands the knees and the feet these are seven so
